lines.text: Enter CLOTEN and two Lords

lines.speaker: first lord
lines.text: Sir, I would advise you to shift a shirt; the violence of action hath made you reek as a sacrifice: where air comes out, air comes in: there's none abroad so wholesome as that you vent.

lines.speaker: cloten
lines.text: If my shirt were bloody, then to shift it. Have I hurt him?

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: [Aside]  No, 'faith; not so much as his patience.

lines.speaker: first lord
lines.text: Hurt him! his body's a passable carcass, if he be not hurt: it is a thoroughfare for steel, if it be not hurt.

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: [Aside]  His steel was in debt; it went o' the backside the town.

lines.speaker: cloten
lines.text: The villain would not stand me.

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: [Aside]  No; but he fled forward still, toward your face.

lines.speaker: first lord
lines.text: Stand you! You have land enough of your own: but he added to your having; gave you some ground.

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: [Aside]  As many inches as you have oceans. Puppies!

lines.speaker: cloten
lines.text: I would they had not come between us.

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: [Aside]  So would I, till you had measured how long a fool you were upon the ground.

lines.speaker: cloten
lines.text: And that she should love this fellow and refuse me!

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: [Aside]  If it be a sin to make a true election, she is damned.

lines.speaker: first lord
lines.text: Sir, as I told you always, her beauty and her brain go not together: she's a good sign, but I have seen small reflection of her wit.

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: [Aside]  She shines not upon fools, lest the reflection should hurt her.

lines.speaker: cloten
lines.text: Come, I'll to my chamber. Would there had been some hurt done!

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: [Aside]  I wish not so; unless it had been the fall of an ass, which is no great hurt.

lines.speaker: cloten
lines.text: You'll go with us?

lines.speaker: first lord
lines.text: I'll attend your lordship.

lines.speaker: cloten
lines.text: Nay, come, let's go together.

lines.speaker: second lord
lines.text: Well, my lord.
Exeunt
